Interface R4JConfig


  • public interface R4JConfig
    Interface for global or thread-local configuration of various base objects.
    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.16.

    • Method Detail

      • useFairLocks

        boolean useFairLocks()
        Returns:
        true if locks used should be fair.

      • silentExceptionHandler

        Action1<? super IOException> silentExceptionHandler()
        Returns:
        The action to invoke on silently closed Closeables' exceptions. May return null indicating a no-op.
